arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest 0 – 3 West Ham United | Final whistle, first impressions
arts.sum: West Ham’s traditional nervy start kept fans on their toes: Three of the four defenders in their new-look back line were playing in different roles to last time out: Hermansen must have been playing with stage fright after his shaky start to his Hammers career and there was a debut for Mateus Fernandes in midfield. […] Source

arts.ttl: Super-sub Summerville: West Ham hammer Nottingham Forest in first Premier League win
arts.sum: West Ham United pick up their first Premier League points of the season on Sunday afternoon as the Hammers secure a 3-0 win over Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest 0-3 West Ham: Hammers claim first win of season for under-pressure boss Graham Potter
arts.sum: Jarrod Bowen, Lucas Paqueta and Callum Wilson ease the pressure on under-fire West Ham boss Graham Potter as they earn a deserved win at Nottingham Forest

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest vs West Ham United LIVE: Paquetá starts despite exit talks
arts.sum: Follow all the action from The City Ground

arts.ttl: Hammers have surprising Nottingham Forest record | West Ham News
arts.sum: West Ham’s trip to the City Ground this afternoon offers the Irons a chance to improve on their recent performances this season: No wins in two in the Premier League and also losing to Wolves and being dumped out of the Carabao cup is as bad a start to a season as most would care […] Source
